songs.title: Bra
songs.lyrics:
[INTRO : Sarkodie]
Huh, ɔdɔ deɛ ɛdɛ oo
Hwɛ, m'akoma mu dɔ, Julie

[VERSE 1 : Sarkodie]
Tie
Wodɔ no abɔ medam
Wodɔ no afira m'ani
Wodɔ no nti me nante bɛdwam a menhwɛ m'akyi
Odɔ no asi m'aso, ɔdɔ no ama m'ayi
M'atɔn me nipadua no ama wo
nti mma wo werɛ mfi
Sɛ mepɛ wo, medɔ wo nti me dea ne wo
Bra na yɛn bɔ bra
Kɔgya me sika dua no so
Mene wo mmienu ka nyɛ sɛ ebia me nyaa wo fo
Meyɛ barima bi a mepɛ adwuma
nti mennyɛ kwaadwofo
Bɔ me nkɔmmɔ dɛ
Nyane me anopa (huh)
Fe m'ano na so me mu na kyerɛ me ɔdɔ pa
Di m'akyi kɔ kurom, A&C bɔ me ka
Ntietie nipa, Temafoɔ ne nsem keka
Julie sɔ me nsa
Yɛnkɔ goro na wo me ba
Ma w'ani kɔ me ho na check w'ayonkofa
Fa mekɔ na fameyɛ nea wopɛ
Mede m'ani ato fam obia nni hɔ a ɔne wosɛ

[CHORUS : PAT THOMAS]
Wodɔ nti ama me didi ɔnyɛ yie
Wodɔ ntia ama me da a me nda oo
Etiri nyɛ bɔferɛ
nso na y'apai mu ahwɛ ama w'ahu
Nti ɔdɔyɛwu bra oo (bra oo)
ɔdɔ ee bra (bra)
ɔdɔyɛwu bra oo (bra, bra ma yɛdi dɔ aa)
ɔdɔ ee bra oo (bra oo)
ɔdɔ ee bra (bra)
Wodɔ ntia (bra, bra ma yɛdi dɔ aa)

[VERSE 2 : SARKODIE]
Obiaa nni hɔ ka wo ho
Wopɛ na medɔ
Obi ne hammer bɛse wopɛ a nhwɛ hɔ
Nom champagne ɛso te a m'atɔ
Wodɔ na me hia me ho mfa me a ɛtu awɔ
Dan woho hwɛ m'anim
Pene na me hwɛ
Nsem hyɛ me tirim ma me ka na yɛmmerɛ
Huh
Follow me to paradise
I can see the future
when I look into your eyes (huh)
Wofata me beamer wofata me benz
Gye me di make you no listen to your friends
Kwame George mra na me tell no sense
Yɛse mmarima suban basaa, it depends
Lord, mefam wo tesɛ glue
W'akoma no pa a ɛworry
m'ahyɛ no blue
True, ma baby you fine
M'ahyɛ wo kawa one time

[CHORUS : PAT THOMAS]
Wodɔ nti ama me didi ɔnyɛ yie
Wodɔ ntia ama me da a me nda oo
Etiri nyɛ bɔferɛ
nso na y'apai mu ahwɛ ama w'ahu
Nti ɔdɔyɛwu bra oo (bra oo)
ɔdɔ ee bra (bra)
ɔdɔyɛwu bra oo (bra, bra ma yɛdi dɔ aa)
ɔdɔ ee bra oo (bra oo)
ɔdɔ ee bra (bra)
Wodɔ ntia (bra, bra ma yɛdi dɔ aa)
Nti ɔdɔyɛwu bra oo (bra oo)
ɔdɔ ee bra (bra)
ɔdɔyɛwu bra oo (bra, bra ma yɛdi dɔ aa)
ɔdɔ ee bra oo (bra oo)
ɔdɔ ee bra (bra)
Wodɔ ntia (bra, bra ma yɛdi dɔ aa)
